name: Tetriphys: The Thing That Should Not Be
name_original: Tetriphys: The Thing That Should Not Be
description:
LD 41 theme was Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Note: for latest version, download Tetriphys-PostCompo-Win64-patch1.rar

Tips:

1. HOLD UP KEY to make the shape float. Other directional keys are useful as well.
2. Press space if you want to shake things up a bit.
3. After the active piece touches floor or other piece you can still control it for about two seconds.
4. Press R key at any time to restart game

5. Oh, right. Align at least eight blocks horizontally (approximately), to make them disappear and get points. Clearing more rows in one go will multiply points.

Tetriphys made in 24 hours by https://ldjam.com/users/kr4ft3r/ for LD41 compo.

Used: Unity, Blender, bfxr.net, Audacity, piskelapp.com, PS
